## spinner() function

Create a spinner component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function spinner(options?: SpinnerBuilderOptions): ComponentBuilder<SpinnerModel>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[SpinnerBuilderOptions](./dsl.spinnerbuilderoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Configuration options for the spinner


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;[SpinnerModel](./spinner.spinnermodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A [ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md) ready to use with [AppBuilder.component()](./dsl.appbuilder.component.md)

## Remarks

Creates a [ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md) wrapping the `@boba-cli/spinner` package. The spinner automatically animates and can be styled with custom colors.

## Example 1

Basic usage:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('loading', spinner())
  .view(({ components }) => components.loading)
  .build()
```

## Example 2

With custom styling:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('loading', spinner({
    style: new Style().foreground('#50fa7b')
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => hstack(
    components.loading,
    text('Loading...')
  ))
  .build()
```
